name: ac-library-zig
readme:
# ac-library-zig

ac-library-zig is a Zig implementation of AtCoder Library (ACL).

See below for ACL.

- [Original repository (implemented in C++)](https://github.com/atcoder/ac-library)
- [AtCoder Library (ACL) - AtCoder](https://atcoder.jp/posts/517)
- [AtCoder Library - Codeforces](https://codeforces.com/blog/entry/82400)

## API Reference

Automatically generated API Reference for the project can be found at https://repos.ryoga.dev/ac-library-zig.

> [!NOTE]
> Zig autodoc is in beta;
> the website may be broken or incomplete.

## Installation

Add `ac-library-zig` package to your `build.zig.zon` by following command:

```shell
# Use tagged release of ac-library-zig
# Replace `<REPLACE ME>` with the version of ac-library-zig that you want to use
# See: https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/releases
zig fetch --save=ac-library git+https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig#<REPLACE ME>

# Use latest build of master branch
zig fetch --save=ac-library git+https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig
```

You can then import `ac-library` in your `build.zig` with:

```zig
const ac_library = b.dependency("ac-library", .{});
const exe = b.addExecutable(...);
exe.root_module.addImport("ac-library", ac_library.module("ac-library"));
```

releases.name: v0.5.1
releases.body:
This release is compatible with Zig v0.15.1.

## What's Changed

- Add missing `convolution` exports to lib.zig

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

releases.name: v0.5.0
releases.body:
This release is compatible with Zig v0.15.1.

## What's Changed
* Implement convolution (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/26)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

releases.name: v0.4.0
releases.body:
This release is compatible with Zig v0.15.1.

## What's Changed
* Implement modint (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/13)
* Update for Zig 0.15.1 (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/24)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

releases.name: v0.3.0
releases.body:
This release is compatible with Zig v0.14.1.

NOTE: This update contains breaking changes to `minRight` and `minLeft` in `Segtree` and `LazySegtree`.

## What's Changed
* Add context to minRight and minLeft args (breaking changes) (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/23)
* Add docs

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

releases.name: v0.2.0
releases.body:
This release is compatible with Zig v0.14.0.

## What's Changed
* Delete `internal_bit.zig`, replace `bitCeil` with `std.math.ceilPowerOfTwo` (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/21)
* Add Docs by (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/20)
* Implement mincostflow (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/16)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

releases.name: v0.1.0
releases.body:
The first release of `ac-library-zig`.

This release is compatible with Zig v0.14.0.

## Added
* fenwicktree (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/1)
* scc (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/2)
* segtree (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/3)
* math (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/6)
* lazysegtree (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/7)
* string (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/12)
* maxflow (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/14)
* twosat (https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/pull/17)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Ryoga-exe/ac-library-zig/commits/v0.1.0
